front.court: HIGH COURT OF UTTARAKHAND AT NAINITAL
front.extra:
(Oral)
Applicant Arjun Singh is in judicial custody in
FIR No.242 of 2022, under Section 8/20/60 of Narcotic
Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985, Police
Station Ramnagar, District-Nainital. He has sought his
release on bail.
2. Heard learned counsel for the parties and
perused the record.
3. It is argued by learned counsel for the
applicant that it is a case of parity; co-accused have
already been granted bail.
4. This fact is admitted by learned State Counsel.
